songs.title: Skies of Rain
songs.lyrics:
I could never put my finger on the moment you turned to a statue
I know you probably thought I noticed that in fact you had turned into stone

Pray tell, pray tell
Where did you go?

I've lost all faith
Now that you're gonna look me in the face
So sick, sick of these lies you used to hide behind
There's no love in your skies of rain

I had always hoped that there would be more to you than guilt trips and raindrops
Every single time I think of you it leaves me feeling alone

Farewell, farewell
It took me so long

I've lost all faith
Now that you're gonna look me in the face
So sick, sick of these lies you used to hide behind
There's no love in your skies of rain

And it's all gone, the connection between us
We're washed up as the driftwood on beaches
And you make no amend
I have no faith in a single word you say
So sick, sick of these lies you used to hide behind
There's no love in your skies of rain
There's no love in your skies of rain
